having <S%G554>stripped<s%> the <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1849>powers,<s%> he made a <S%G1165>show<s%> of them <S%G3954>openly,<s%> triumphing <S%G2358>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>
